thread.title: TRAPPIST-1 solar system discovery sparks jokes about Donald Trump
thread.title_full: TRAPPIST-1 solar system discovery sparks jokes about Donald Trump

author: Mark Molloy
title: TRAPPIST-1 solar system discovery sparks jokes about Donald Trump
text:
News TRAPPIST-1 solar system discovery sparks jokes about Donald Trump Nasa has discovered a new TRAPPIST-1 solar system, seen in this concept image Credit: NASA via Getty Images Mark Molloy 23 February 2017 • 10:18am 
N asa’s 'amazing' discovery of a new solar system just 39 light years away has sparked a host of unlikely jokes about Donald Trump. 
As well as speculation about aliens , many Twitter users joked about leaving planet Earth to get away from the US president. One month of Trump and NASA is literally announcing that it has found a potential back-up Earth. #askNASA — James O'Malley (@Psythor) February 22, 2017 
“One month of Trump and NASA is literally announcing that it has found a potential back-up Earth,” joked one Twitter user. 
“2017 saved,” wrote another. 
N ASA : S--t 
*a few weeks later* 
NASA : we've found 7 planets, 3 we can live on and there's enough room for everyone" 
Gags and puns about building a giant space barrier around Earth to protect us from any extraterrestrials that might be living in the newly discovered TRAPPIST-1 solar system also followed. How Twitter reacted Time to build a barrier? Trump just announced that we're building a giant space barrier around the Earth, and we're going to get planet Trappist-e to pay for it — Jason Mayland (@JaymayAllDay) February 22, 2017 Trump administration announces plan to build wall around #TRAPPIST -1 system. — Mike Spry (@mdspry) February 22, 2017 Or leave planet Earth? Nasa discovered 7 new habitable planets. Yall thought I was about to stay for the rest of the Trump presidency? pic.twitter.com/qRu9JkOJDi — A osman (@abdirahman_o) February 23, 2017 Let's Leave the Earth to Trump and Putin. May they battle it out. We are flying to #Trappist ! — Udo Nobili (@udoAugenAuf) February 22, 2017 Or send Trump there? You knw NASA can always send trump to TRAPPIST-1 just to check whether its safe or not. Really... do dis.. send him....away... asap..like rn
